talk.chat:
Guard Praga:
Gludin is a large port village on the southwest coast. Ships to Talking Island depart from there regularly.
If you want to go to the village of Gludin, take this road west until you come to a fork in the road, then take the road that goes southwest. You have to pass the Abandoned Camp, where ol mahum deserters are encamped, so be particularly careful.
Return

Guard Praga:
Welcome, traveler. Have you come to rest in our beautiful village? Or are you on the brink of beginning a new journey? If you follow the road in front of me to the west, you can pass the Abandoned Camp and go all the way to Gludin.
Ask about the 'Abandoned Camp'.
Ask about 'Gludin'.
Ask about the local lord and tax rate.
Quest

Guard Praga:
If you follow this road west, you will come to a fork in the road. If you turn to the southwest, you will pass the Abandoned Camp. Once, it was a camp for the Gracian armies, but it has been abandoned for some time and is now the camp for the ol mahums.
Those nasty ol mahums were hired by Gracia as mercenaries, but they were unable to return to their country and were left here to plunder for a living. So you must be extra careful when you're traveling near there, or you may be ambushed by ol mahum looters.
Return
